TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Build Feline buildings and units faster in this city.
TEXT.French: Construit les bâtiments et unités félines plus vite dans cette Ville.
TEXT.Italian: Questo edificio ti permette di addestrare le unità feline più velocemente.
TEXT.Polish: Buduj budynki i jednostki Wielkich Kotów szybciej w Twoim mieście.

TEXT.English: Cat training is the process of modifying a wild cat's behavior for entertainment or companionship purposes. Training is commonly used to reduce unwanted or problematic behaviors in wild cats, to enhance interactions between humans and cats, and to allow them to coexist comfortably. There are various methods for training cats which employ different balances between reward and punishment.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Big Cat Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] is required to train cat units.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Entraineur de Félins[COLOR_REVERT] est requis pour entraîner des unités félines.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Felis Superior[COLOR_REVERT] its similar unit as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyber Dog[COLOR_REVERT], but instead dogs its using bioenhanced panthers. Its ideal to police action and to thwart enemy spies and criminal units.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guard Cat[COLOR_REVERT] its similar unit as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guard Dog[COLOR_REVERT], but instead dogs its using trained panthers. Its ideal to thwart enemy spies and criminal units and as skirmisher.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Police Cat[COLOR_REVERT] its similar unit as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Police Dog[COLOR_REVERT], but instead dogs its using trained panthers. Its ideal to police action and to thwart enemy spies and criminal units.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trained Cat[COLOR_REVERT] its similar unit as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trained Dog[COLOR_REVERT], but instead dogs its using trained panthers. Its ideal against criminal units and as skirmisher.

Cat training is the process of modifying a wild cat's behavior for entertainment or companionship purposes. Training is commonly used to reduce unwanted or problematic behaviors in wild cats, to enhance interactions between humans and cats, and to allow them to coexist comfortably. There are various methods for training cats which employ different balances between reward and punishment.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Cat[COLOR_REVERT] its similar unit as [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wardog[COLOR_REVERT], but instead dogs its using trained panthers. Its ideal against criminal units and as skirmisher.
